column1: 2010/02/03," The sculpture ''L'Homme qui marche I'' by Alberto Giacometti sells in London for £65 million (US$103.7 million), setting a new world record for a work of art sold at auction.{{cite news
column4: title=Giacometti Sculpture 'L'Homme qui marche I' Fetches $104.3ampnbspMillion
column16: title=Giacometti Sculpture Becomes Most Expensive Work Ever to Sell at Auction
column25: title=Alberto Giacometti statue breaks auction record with £65m sale
